MRVC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Additional General Manager and Other Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 10:25 IST
 Indian Railway Recruitment Board
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 80,000 to 260,000




FOLLOW

The Mumbai Railway Vikas Corporation (MRVC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Additional General Manager, Deputy General Manager, and Joint General Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the MRVC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

MRVC Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Additional General Manager	01	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering 
Joint General Manager	01
Deputy General Manager	01

MRVC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 50 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

MRVC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Document Verification.
Medical Exam.
Interview.

MRVC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

MRVC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 80,000/- per month.
The maximum salary:  Rs. 2,60,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the MRVC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the MRVC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned e-mail address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

E-mail Address:

career@mrvc.gov.in.

Important Dates:

Starting date	22-08-2025
Closing date	20-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
